mapper.select: SELECT id, name, p_id, team_id FROM folder WHERE id != 1 AND p_id = 1
SELECT id, name, p_id, team_id FROM folder WHERE p_id = #{p_id}

WITH RECURSIVE C AS ( SELECT id FROM folder WHERE id = ${folderId} UNION ALL SELECT f.id FROM folder f JOIN C rf ON f.p_id = rf.id ) SELECT c.id AS clip_id, c.team_id, t.name AS `team_name`, c.folder_id, f.name AS `folder_name`,
cm.clip_uuid, cm.file_name, cm.file_ext, cm.file_path, cm.format_long_name, cm.file_duration / 60 AS file_duration, ROUND(cm.file_size / (1024 * 1024), 2) AS file_size, DATE(c.ingest_at) AS ingest_at, DATE(c.end_at) AS end_at, c.del_fl FROM clip c LEFT JOIN ingest i ON i.id = c.ingest_id LEFT JOIN team t ON t.id = c.team_id LEFT JOIN folder f ON f.id = c.folder_id LEFT JOIN convert_metadata cm ON cm.id = c.convert_metadata_id WHERE c.folder_id IN (SELECT id FROM C) ORDER BY c.end_at DESC;
